info.title: CLARK Gateway
info.description: The API gateway for all of the CLARK microservices

get.description: Gets a list of featured objects

patch.description: Updates the list of featured objects

requestBody.description: The cuid, version, and author's username

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User does not have privilege to update featured objects

delete.description: Removes a mapping from a object's outcome

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the author for the learning object

parameters.name: learningObjectId
parameters.description: The id of the learning object (not cuid)

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - Another user is trying to access a author's outcome on a object

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object, mapping, outcome, or user not found

parameters.name: cuid
parameters.description: The cuid of the learning object

requestBody.description: The cuid, version, and author's username

changelogText.description: This is the text of the changelog

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is not a admin or editor

404.description: NOT FOUND - Learning object or user not found

get.description: Gets a changelog for a object

parameters.name: cuid
parameters.description: The cuid of the learning object

500.description: INTERNAL SERVICE ERROR - Collection not found

404.description: NOT FOUND - Collection not found

hasLogo.description: True if the collection has a logo

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in

parameters.name: cuid
parameters.description: The cuid of the object to download

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access an in review object as a unprivileged user

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object not found

schema.description: A partial object of type FileMetadata

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User does not have permission to update the file

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object or file not found

delete.description: Deletes a file from a object

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User does not have permission to delete the file

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object or file not found

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User does not have permission to update the README

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object not found

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access an in review object as a unprivileged user

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object or file not found

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in and trying to access a in review object

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access an in review object as a unprivileged user

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object not found

post.description: Adds file meta data to a object

401.description: UNAUTHENTICATED - User is not logged in

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access an in review object as a unprivileged user

404.description: NOT FOUND - Object not found

get.description: Gets the learning object metrics for CLARK

404.description: NOT FOUND - No metrics were found

get.description: Gets the metrics for a learning object

parameters.name: cuid
parameters.description: The cuid of the learning object

saves.description: The number of saves for a particular object

downloads.description: The number of downloads for a particular object

404.description: NOT FOUND - No metrics were found for the specific username and cuid

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user's library

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The current page of the library

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of objects to return

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access another user's library

404.description: NOT FOUND - User not found

post.description: Adds a learning object to the user's library

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user's library

requestBody.description: The cuid, version, and author's username

cuid.description: The cuid of the learning object to save

version.description: The version of the learning object

authorUsername.description: The username of the object's author

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access and modify another user's library

404.description: NOT FOUND - User or learning object not found

delete.description: Deletes an item from the user's library

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the user's library

parameters.name: cuid
parameters.description: The cuid of the learning object to remove

204.description: NO CONTENT - Successfully deleted from library

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access and modify another user's library

404.description: NOT FOUND - User or learning object not found

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The notification limit to send back in the request

400.description: BAD CONTENT - Page and limit query parameters must be greater then zero

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access another user's notifications

404.description: NOT FOUND - User not found

delete.description: Deletes a notification for a user

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to delete another user's notifications

404.description: NOT FOUND - User or notification not found

get.description: Gets the ratings for a learning object

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

ratings.description: The array of ratings left on the object

404.description: NOT FOUND - Learning object not found

post.description: Creates a rating on a object

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - Object attempting to rate is in review (not released)

404.description: NOT FOUND - Learning object was not found

get.description: Gets a specific rating by id

404.description: NOT FOUND - Rating was not found

patch.description: Updates a rating on a object

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

parameters.name: ratingID
parameters.description: The id of the rating to update

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access and modify another user's rating

404.description: NOT FOUND - Rating or object was not found

delete.description: Deletes a rating from a learning object

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

parameters.name: ratingID
parameters.description: The id of the rating to delete

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - User is trying to access and modify another user's rating

404.description: NOT FOUND - Rating or object was not found

post.description: Flags a rating to be reviewed

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - Author is attempting to flag a rating

404.description: NOT FOUND - Learning object or rating was not found

post.description: Creates a response to a rating

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - Is not author or contributor

404.description: NOT FOUND - Learning object or rating was not found

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - Is not the creator of the response

404.description: NOT FOUND - Learning object, rating, or response was not found

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the object's author

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the object

403.description: UNAUTHORIZED - Is not the creator of the response

404.description: NOT FOUND - Learning object, rating, or response was not found

id.description: The id of the learning object

cuid.description: The cuid of the learning object

author.description: A partial user object of the learning object's author

collection.description: The collection the learning object belongs to

contributors.description: A optional array of extra contributors to the object

date.description: The date the learning object was created

description.description: The description of the learning object

length.description: The length of the learning object

name.description: The name of the learning object
name.example: This is a learning object name

status.description: The current status of the learning object

resourceUris.description: The extra resource uris of the learning object

revisionUri.description: The new revision uri of the learning object

version.description: The current version of the learning object

levels.description: An array of appropriate academic levels to the object

emailVerified.description: A boolean representing if the user's email has been verified

bio.description: A short biography of the user

createdAt.description: The date when the user was created

outcomes.description: The uri for the outcomes of a learning object

children.description: The uri for the children of a learning object

materials.description: The uri for the materials of a learning object

metrics.description: The uri for the metrics of a learning object

parents.description: The uri for the parents of a learning object

ratings.description: The uri for the ratings of a learning object

cuid.description: The cuid relating to the changelog

logs.description: The changes made to the object

date.description: The date the changelog was created in ms

userId.description: The id of the changelog author

name.description: The name of the changelog author

role.description: The role of the changelog author

profileImage.description: The profile image of the changelog author

saves.description: The number of saves for a particular collection

downloads.description: The number of downloads for a particular collection

top5Downloads.description: The top downloads of a particular collection

statusMetrics.description: The learning object statuses for the collection

waiting.description: The number of in waiting objects

peerReview.description: The number of in review objects

proofing.description: The number of in proofing objects

downloads.description: The number of downloads for a particular learning object

learningObjectCuid.description: The cuid of the learning object

hasLogo.description: True if the collection has a logo

createdDate.description: The date the file was created

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date the file was last updated

learningObjectId.description: The learning object the file belongs to

packageable.description: Whether the file can be packaged in a zip file

storageRevision.description: The version number of the file in S3

ETag.description: The server generated hash of the file's content

fullPath.description: The path of the file (including folders and file name)

mimeType.description: The mime type of the file

previewUrl.description: The preview url of the file

date.description: The date the file was last updated

fullPath.description: The path of the file (including folders and file name)

packageable.description: Whether the file can be packaged in a zip file

storageRevision.description: The version number of the file in S3

saves.description: The number of saves for a particular collection

downloads.description: The number of downloads for a particular collection

topDownloads.description: The top downloads of a particular collection

savedOn.description: When the object was saved to the user's library

savedBy.description: The username of the user who saved the object

learningObject.description: The learning object saved to the library

timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the notification was created

_id.description: The id of the rating object

value.description: The rating value, an integer, out of 5

user.description: The user who left the rating

comment.description: The comment the person made on the rating

date.description: The date the person created the rating

response.description: An array of potential responses to the rating

_id.description: The id of the response object

user.description: The user who left the response

comment.description: The comment the person made on the response

date.description: The date the person created the response

comment.description: The comment for why the rating was flagged

ratingId.description: The id of the rating flagged

date.description: The time when the rating was flagged

username.description: The username of the person who flagged the rating
The username of the person who left the rating

name.description: The name of the person who left the rating

email.description: The email of the person who left the rating
